articles.description: The 48th edition of a Canadian and Ottawa classic festival, Winterlude, is starting during some frigid temperatures. articles.title: Legendary Canadian actress Catherine O’Hara dies at 71
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Catherine O’Hara, a gifted Canadian-born comic actor and “SCTV” alum who starred as Macaulay Culkin’s harried mother in two “Home Alone” movies and won an Emmy as the dramatically ditzy wealthy matriarch Moira Rose in “Schitt’s Creek,” died Friday. articles.title: Third person charged with murder in Ottawa’s first homicide of the year
